front.title: Cooperative research opportunities at NIST

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)
National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: The report contents include: Cooperative research at NIST; Research opportunities; Analytical chemistry; Applied mathematics; Atomic, molecular, and optical physics; Building technology; Ceramics; Chemical technology; Computer systems; Electronics and electrical engineering; Fire research; Manufacturing engineering; Materials reliability; Metallurgy; Neutron scattering and diffraction; Nondestructive evaluation; Polymers; Radiation research; and Standard reference data.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
